adHeader: ANY Traffic Ticket, ALL Types of Drivers
adDetails: OUR PRACTICE AREAS: • Speeding • Red light (camera) • Lane violation • Traffic sign violations • Illegal U-turn • Overweight load • Log book • Equipment violation • Correctable Violations • Insurance / Registration • Suspended license • FTA (Failure to Appear) • Warrants • DMV hearings • DUI / DWI • Reckless driving • Hit & run • Cell phone • Seat belt • Possession of narcotics in vehicle • Cleaning driving record (Purge) • Expungement • Appeals (Motion to Reopen) • Other traffic related violations REASONS TO FIGHT YOUR TICKET: • SAVE money, time & energy • NO points on your record • LOW insurance premiums • NO warrants, NO arrests • NO license suspension REASONS TO CHOOSE OUR EXPERIENCED LAWYERS: • ALL efforts to DISMISS your ticket with BEST PRICES • ALL types of drivers (incl.
